review: Very good. The hook up was easy

review: I found the Amazon Fire TV very easy to connect all by myself. It was just amazing. The searches for things to watch were laid out very smartly. Being able to put items on my wish list is very helpful. AndBut what was I expecting . . .it's Amazon!
author: Amazon Customer "mystery/suspense diva"

review: We purchased the Amazon Fire Tv last night and signed up for amazon prime. The box was $100 and Amazon prime was$99.99/year. We werent expecting to have to pay for every episode of any decent TV shows or movies in addition. Anyone else have a thought??
author: Harland Hafter

review: One of the best purchases we've ever made to enhance our digital life at home. Now that I have my FIRE, I do not need to rely on using my PS3 to watch Netflix, Instant Video or Hulu.The unit is very fast and is able to switch between applications without hesitation. Besides performance, the Amazon FIRE looks great in our living room.
author: Interalejo "A. Gonzalez Urquia"

review: Love, love, love this! Best purchase ever. I can binge watch just about any series either on Prime or Netflix. Plus you can rent movies with one click and without getting off the couch. It took me about 3-4 minutes to set it up and have had no problems.

review: Great way to view old (like me) television from "back in the day"

review: Amazing ! I'm so glad I kept purring off buying the Downtown Abbey series. Seasons 1-4 are on here.
